definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: Also, we can finally turn the spotlights off.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我們也終於能關上那盞聚光燈了。

sentences.english: Many spot lights towards a central point on a piece of white paper.
sentences.chinese: 衆多的聚光燈都照向一張白紙的中心點。

sentences.english: This week we put these issues under the spotlight in a series of articles.
sentences.chinese: 本週，我們把這些問題置於一系列文章的聚光燈下。

sentences.english: Early in his disease, Muhammad shied away from the spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 在患病初期，穆罕默德遠離了媒體的聚光燈。

sentences.english: You think you're important, which is why the spotlight effect exists.
sentences.chinese: 你覺得自己很重要，所以就有聚光燈效應存在。

sentences.english: Spotlights pre-wired to a cable can be used to illuminate landscape features.
sentences.chinese: 聚光燈前的有線電纜可以用來照明景觀特色。

sentences.english: That is because the heavy snows that have been accumulating in central China were falling on places far out of the spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 那是因爲華中積聚的大雪降落在遠離聚光燈的地方。

sentences.english: Everyone involved in a conversation should get their time in the spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 一場談話的每一個人都希望自己能一直在聚光燈下。

sentences.english: It's turns to a stage, they're gone, and this spotlight is on.
sentences.chinese: 外面變成了舞臺，他們都消失了，聚光燈亮了起來。

sentences.english: This has left Baku gearing up for the limelight.
sentences.chinese: 這一切讓巴庫走到了聚光燈下。

sentences.english: Swaying dance in nib, is the most strong touch of red spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 搖曳在筆尖的舞姿，是聚光燈下最濃烈的一抹豔紅。

sentences.english: A spotlight threw a pool of violet light on the stage.
sentences.chinese: 聚光燈在舞臺上灑下一團紫光。

sentences.english: I want to thank the Galaxy for letting me share in the spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 我要感謝銀河隊讓我在這聚光燈下與你們一起分享。

sentences.english: He is likely to be thrusted into the national political limelight.
sentences.chinese: 他很有可能被推到國家政治鬥爭的聚光燈下。

sentences.english: To prove the feeling is mutual, he heads back out into the spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 爲了表示這種熱情是相互的，他轉身走回聚光燈下。

sentences.english: For McAvoy, this means an extended spell in the spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 對麥艾維而言，這代表他又要在聚光燈下待一陣子了。

definition: lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
to drift without a resting place (idiom)/roving/errant/vagrant/erratic
to bare fangs and brandish claws (idiom); to make threatening gestures
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
